verbs.description: a look at the worst natural disasters in every state 4 7 wall st [V: has] compiled a list of the worst natural disaster in every state as ranked by loss of life we used data and information from federal government agencies as well as resource material and newspaper and historical accounts from the time of the event to compile this list in some cases a disaster was so widespread and resulted in such a substantial loss of life that it remains the worst disaster in multiple states united states geological survey atlantic ocean mexico national oceanic and atmospheric administration lake okeechobee hurricane mississippi river brazos river galveston indiana waco texas earthquake
